snippet: Defense Secretary Leon Panetta will outline how the Pentagon is refocusing on the Pacific, as the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan are over or winding down.
abstract: Defense Sec Leon E Panetta will travel across Asia in attempt to convince allies that the United States will continue to be a pivotal military power in region while reassuring China that the relocation of resources from Iraq and Afghanistan is not meant as a confrontation.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon Panetta will outline how the Pentagon is refocusing on the Pacific, as the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan are over or winding down.

headline.seo: Panetta to Visit Asia to Discuss Military’s Shift There
headline.main: Panetta Set to Discuss U.S. Shift in Asia Trip
headline.print_headline: Panetta Set To Discuss U.S. Shift In Asia Trip
